name: Treasures of the Sinking Sands
description:
TREASURES OF THE SINKING SANDS

INSTRUCTIONS: Once the timer has run out, hold down the mouse to plan where you'll dig, then release the mouse button to get your mateys to start diggin! 
(I encourage you to play in Fullscreen mode!)

The most important part of being a pirate is: REMEMBER WHERE THE BEST TREASURE IS BURIED!!

Treasures of the Sinking Sands shows you valuable treasure sinking below the sands.  Different items have different value, so try to remember where all the loot is and pick the best spot to dig!  Once your crew has collected enough treasure you'll be able to set sail once more and live like kings and queens!

~A game made for Pirate  Jam Pre-Jam Skirmish 2020 (https://itch.io/jam/prejamskirmish2020), 

~Eligible for all prizes, email: steven.hart282@gmail.com

~using assets from the Unity Asset Store, Music: The Buccaneer's Haul by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com, fonts by joannavu https://www.fontspace.com/joannavu and T Cundrawan https://www.fontspace.com/cove703

Thanks for playing!

-steve
